text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    HIV.D.DE62No chronic or past health conditionsExisting chronic health conditions - No chronic or past health conditions
    HIV.D.DE63Don't know if there are any chronic or past health conditionsExisting chronic health conditions - Don't know if there are any chronic or past health conditions
    HIV.D.DE64Diabetes other or unspecifiedExisting chronic health conditions - Diabetes other or unspecified
    HIV.D.DE65Diabetes Pre-existing type 1Existing chronic health conditions - Diabetes Pre-existing type 1
    HIV.D.DE66Diabetes Pre-existing type 2Existing chronic health conditions - Diabetes Pre-existing type 2
    HIV.D.DE67HypertensionExisting chronic health conditions - Hypertension
    HIV.D.DE68Other (specify)Existing chronic health conditions - Other (specify)

name: ExistingchronichealthconditionsCodes
title: Existing chronic health conditions Codes
description: Codes representing possible values for the Existing chronic health conditions element

concept.display: No chronic or past health conditions
Don't know if there are any chronic or past health conditions
